snippet: Jonathan Martin, national political correspondent for The Times, on contests to watch in North Carolina, Georgia and Kentucky for early clues about the 2014 midterm elections.
abstract: Jonathan Martin, national political correspondent for The Times, on contests to watch in North Carolina, Georgia and Kentucky for early clues about the 2014 midterm elections.

headline.main: Times Minute | Three Primaries to Watch
